TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OptionCompareAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Specifies that the current `Option Compare` setting should be passed as the default value for an argument.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class supports the Visual Basic compiler and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
